tenants.description: The list of tenants that this tokens issue will generate tokens for.

use_sk.description: Whether this tokens service should use an external Tapis Security Kernel for its auth. NOTE: This should always be TRUE in production

tenant_iss.description: The list of tenants that this tokens issue will generate tokens for.

dev_jwt_public_key.description: The public key associated with the private key to use for signing JWTs in dev mode. NOTE: This should NOT be used in production

dev_jwt_private_key.description: A private key to use for signing JWTs in dev mode. NOTE: This should NOT be used in production

dev_iss.description: The URL to use for the 'iss' claim in dev mode. NOTE: This should NOT be used in production

sql_db_url.description: full URL, including protocol and database, to the SQL db.
